'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Sātahuzi is the aumaua village sitting on the coast north of [Port Maje](/portMaje/). As long-time neighbors of the VTC, they have enjoyed relations that alternated between friendly and strained. In recent days, the warriors of [Storm Speaker Ikawha](/stormSpeakerIkawha/) have been instrumental in keeping the peace as the floods caused by [Eothas](/eothas/) ravaged the land. The Huana believe in a mutually beneficial relationship, however: In return for their aid and goods, they receive guns, medicine, food, wine, and even help with their boats.

## Points of interest

* This is a small village. The Storm Speaker and head of the village is in the center, with her lodge to the northwest and her daughter's lodge to the northeast.

## Characters

* [Storm Speaker Ikawha](/stormSpeakerIkawha/), at the center totem, at nighttime she returns to her lodge.
* [Mokeha](/mokeha/), a tough-looking mataru.
* [Eofania](/eofania/), the local merchant.
* [Namai](/namai/), a basket weaver.

## Loot

* [Shorewalker Sandals](/shorewalkerSandals/): Sold by [Eofania](/eofania/).
